GSSP Location: Enorama Creek, Flinders Ranges, South Australia
Boundary Level: base of the Marinoan cap carbonate
Correlation Events: (1) rapid decay of Marinoan ice sheets and onset of distinct cap carbonates throughout the world, and (2) the beginning of a distinctive pattern of secular changes in carbon isotopes.

GSSP Location: Will be placed at a that lies stratigraphically beneath the first appearance of widespread glaciation and is assigned in the interim a 'calibrated age' of circa 720 Ma
Defined chronometrically, but it will be replaced by GSSP
